_header: Counsel the redeless and thee will
_description: The spiritual works of mercy — four couplets

BodHat12.First Lines:
Counseil þe redeles & þe willeChasty þe wanton
                    þat wille do ille…
BodHat12.Last Lines:
…And pray for þem þat er in waþat god deliuer
                    þem sone þar fra
